rooms.description: Spacious living area with Scandinavian design elements; features natural light and an open layout.
Modern kitchen with functional Scandinavian design and ample storage space.
Master bedroom with a private balcony; designed according to Vastu principles for optimal energy flow.
Well-equipped bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, incorporating Scandinavian aesthetics.

openings.description: Door connecting living room and kitchen.
Window leading to the private balcony of bedroom 1.

rooms.description: Second bedroom with Scandinavian interior and a spacious balcony for relaxation.
Cozy study area designed with Scandinavian minimalism and functional layout.

openings.description: Door connecting bedroom 2 to the study area.
Window in study area for natural light.
